data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ulsan Hyundai are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 4, Daegu needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ulsan Hyundai are pushing forward but Koh Myeong-jin's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Daegu.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Koh Myeong-jin of Ulsan Hyundai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 16, Daegu are coming forward and Tsubasa Nishi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
In the minute 18, Daegu have a goal kick.
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Daegu pushes forward through Dejan Damjanovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 26, Daegu drive upfield and Cesinha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ulsan Hyundai defender.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Chung-Yong Lee of Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 30, Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Daegu close to the penalty box.
Daegu are pushing forward but Dejan Damjanovic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Goal kick for Daegu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 36, Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic is on target but unsuccessful.
Daegu takes a corner from the right.
Jeong Tae-wook (Daegu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Daegu.
Junior Negrao (Ulsan Hyundai) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Daegu.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, It's now 1-0 thanks to an own goal from Kim Jae-woo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu drives forward and Dejan Damjanovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Can Daegu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Daegu.
Cesinha equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Kim Sung-joon with Sin Jin-ho.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Lee Dong-kyeong is on a sub for Park Jeong-in for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
Throw-in for Daegu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Goal kick for Daegu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Kim Dae-won is replacing Park Han-Bin for the away team.
Ulsan Hyundai takes a corner from the right.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
In the minute 75, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Won Du-jae (Ulsan Hyundai) has received a first yellow card.
Daegu make their second substitution with Edgar Silva replacing Dejan Damjanovic.
In the minute 76, Daegu's Edgar Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Daegu pushes forward through Kim Dae-won, whose finish on goal is saved.
Daegu takes a corner from the right.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Hwang Tae-hyeon is replacing Jeong Seung-won for the away team.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Koh Myeong-jin with Bjorn Johnsen.
Ulsan Hyundai's Bjorn Johnsen has run offside.
Junior Negrao of Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 83, Daegu have a goal kick.
Edgar Silva's header is off-target for Daegu.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
In the minute 86, Daegu are coming forward and Cesinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 89, Daegu's Cesinha misses with an attempt on goal.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Daegu drives forward and Cesinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Daegu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Edgar Silva of Daegu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
